DataElement.preferredName: Neurologic Disease or Disorder Patient Dental Procedure Additional Training and Education Training and Education Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: (noor-uh-LOJ-ik) Having to do with nerves or the nervous system._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The total of dental diagnostic, preventive, and restorative services provided to meet the needs of a patient_Added; extra. (from American Heritage Dictionary)_To teach theory and hands on experience_To teach theory and hands on experience_An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

(from American Heritage Dictionary)_To teach theory and hands on experience

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to nerves or the nervous system.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Dental Procedure Additional Training and Education
Property.preferredDefinition: The total of dental diagnostic, preventive, and restorative services provided to meet the needs of a patient:Added; extra. (from American Heritage Dictionary):To teach theory and hands on experience

Concepts.definition: Any of the dental diagnostic, preventive, and restorative services provided to meet the needs of a patient.
To teach theory and hands on experience

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Which response best represent
ReferenceDocuments.description: Which response best represents the desire you have to receive additional training for patients with the following conditions: Neurological Disorders (e.g. Multiple Sclerosis, Huntington's Disease, ect.)?
